content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-12.5, -49.5) which is responsible for transferring items between the furnace and a wooden chest.
- Wooden Chest at position (-11.5, -49.5) used for storing produced iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Lack of Inventory Items
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. For example, attempting to insert iron ore or coal without having them in your inventory will result in an error.

### Errors when Inserter Alignment is Incorrect
- Verify the alignment of inserters to ensure they are correctly positioned to pick up and drop items between entities. Misalignment can cause the inserter to fail in transferring items.

### Errors when Furnace is Out of Fuel or Ingredients
- Regularly check the fuel and ingredient levels in furnaces to prevent them from running out, which can halt production. Ensure a steady supply of fuel and raw materials to maintain continuous operation.
